product.name: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser
product.description: Gentle non-foaming cleanser that removes dirt while hydrating the skin.
product.how_to_use: Apply to wet skin, massage gently, rinse thoroughly.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: A bit heavy for oily skin.

product.careInstructions: Use morning and night on wet skin.

product.name: Plavix (Clopidogrel)
product.description: Used to prevent blood clots in patients who have had a recent heart attack or stroke, or who have peripheral arterial disease.
product.careInstructions: Consult a physician for dosage and use.
product.ingredient_list: Clopidogrel Bisulfate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Hydroxypropylcellulose, Mannitol, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Polyethylene Glycol 6000.

product.name: The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
product.description: Reduces the appearance of blemishes and congestion.
product.how_to_use: Apply a few drops morning and evening before creams.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: A bit heavy for oily skin.

product.careInstructions: Avoid contact with eyes.

product.name: Flagyl (Metronidazole)
product.description: Used to treat bacterial infections, particularly anaerobic bacteria, and parasitic infections in the gastrointestinal tract and other areas.
product.careInstructions: Avoid alcohol during and after treatment.
product.ingredient_list: Metronidazole, Cellulose, Hydroxypropyl Cellulose, Polyethylene Glycol, Titanium Dioxide.

product.name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios SPF 60
product.description: Broad-spectrum sunscreen for sensitive skin.
product.how_to_use: Apply before sun exposure, reapply every 2 hours.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: A bit heavy for oily skin.

product.name: Diazepam (Diazepam)
product.description: Used to treat anxiety, alcohol withdrawal symptoms, and muscle spasms. It has a calming effect on the central nervous system.
product.careInstructions: Highly controlled substance. Use strictly as prescribed.
product.ingredient_list: Diazepam, Lactose Monohydrate, Corn Starch, Magnesium Stearate, D&C Yellow No. 10.

product.name: Augmentin (Amoxicillin + Clavulanic Acid)

product.careInstructions: Use nightly.

product.name: Lactulose (Duphalac)
product.description: Used to treat constipation by drawing water into the colon, which softens the stool. It is also used to treat hepatic encephalopathy.
product.careInstructions: Mix with water or juice.

product.description: Broad-spectrum SPF 60 sunscreen for face and body. Non-greasy formula providing advanced protection from UVA and UVB rays.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: Leaves a slight white cast.

product.careInstructions: Reapply every 2 hours during sun exposure.

customer_reviews.top_negative_review: May sting sensitive areas.

product.name: Prozac (Fluoxetine)

product.name: Ondansetron (Zofran)
